text: Hey <@U04M8KXHTNG>, Can I use Custom workflow action API with _*Marketing Hub*_ _Starter_ account?
Custom Actions are currently available inside the Workflows app in our Pro+ tiers. Our Marketing Hub Starter automation comes with some out of the box actions built by HubSpot.

Hi!

My team uses SignRequest to sign documents. I'm trying to build a workflow that triggers an event when a contract is signed in SignRequest. The problem is, I'm having trouble figuring out how to do that. Looks like I may have to create a custom webhook? If so, how do I generate a "get" webhook URL?
